record1.<1>: Select original (OIPI) or new (OIPI.NET) print processor

<2>.<2,1>: Set field 1 to VSPRINTER to use OIPI, or VSPRINTER2 to use OIPI.NET
<2>.<2,2>: Optionally set field 2 to 1 to cache this selection
<2>.<2,4>: Note: If selection is cached, and you wish to change field 1, please run REFRESH_VSPRINTER to clear the cached value
